sentences.chinese: 山姆聽了父親的一席話後，羞愧得說不出話來。

sentences.english: His remarks about gardening were hardly to the purpose.
sentences.chinese: 他對園藝的一席話簡直是文不對題。

sentences.english: I found the teacher's words made me understood easily.
sentences.chinese: 我發現老師的一席話讓我很容易就懂了。

sentences.english: This was worse than a thousand whippings.
sentences.chinese: 這一席話比一千下鞭打更管用。

sentences.english: What Confucius said couldn't dissuade Yanhui yet. He went on saying, "I will be upright inside and deferential outside."

sentences.english: Listen to your words, died a victim of murder.
sentences.chinese: 聽君一席話，死後無全屍。

sentences.english: Deputy section of Sun Tak The remarks just solved the author's questions.
sentences.chinese: 副段長孫德剛的一席話解開了筆者的疑問。

sentences.english: His remarks swelled a past event up in my mind.
sentences.chinese: 他的一席話使一段往事湧上了我的心頭。

sentences.english: What you said spoiled my plan.
sentences.chinese: 你說的一席話把我的計劃給毀了。

sentences.english: The teacher's words made me at once become enlightened.
sentences.chinese: 老師的一席話使我頓開茅塞。
法蘭克的一席話傷了我的心。

sentences.english: His words fetched a laugh from all present.
sentences.chinese: 他的一席話使在場的人都笑了。
